channel.title: Enemies 'disappearing' in bm_c2a2b [Fixed]
channel.description:
I've recorded a demo for you to see. The demo looks the same as I played it. Enemies are there, but they are invisible.
[img]https://gyazo.com/dc9133d788cea88d049501cb75bd7a6a.png?1348049196[/img]
[code]] status hostname: Half-Life 2 version : 1.0.1.0/14 4104 insecure map : bm_c2a2b at: 1262 x, -93 y, 248 z players : 1 (1 max)
# userid name uniqueid connected ping loss state adr # 2 "felcon" UNKNOWN 00:10 18 0 active loopback[/code]
demo: [url='https://www.mediafire.com/?naodugb1hatoc1n']mediafire[/url] Virustotal:[url='https://www.virustotal.com/file/581279c5fb480953f1da864edec7f2d6d732c374f7cae8808634eb9b881d00ae/analysis/1348049571/']link[/url] [code]SHA256: 581279c5fb480953f1da864edec7f2d6d732c374f7cae8808634eb9b881d00ae File name: enemies_disappearing_1.dem Detection ratio: 0 / 43 Analysis date: 2012-09-19 10:12:51 UTC[/code]
I'm sorry if I posted some unrelated info about the VirusTotal, but hey, you can't allways be sure what you download.

item.title: Enemies 'disappearing' in bm_c2a2b [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: lexa2
item.description:
Looking at this video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zrueV9NWonE&feature=youtu.be
I start to think that this is a “feature” of the engine having HECU soldiers in a kind-a “unactivated” state until you trigger them somehow. And it seems that there is no visible model for thin unactivated state. Just a wild guess but it’s just what it looks like.

Read full topic

item.title: Enemies 'disappearing' in bm_c2a2b [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: lexa2
item.description:
I’ve already confirmed it to happen on three PCs I have ATM on hands, all having different hardware configs, e.t.c., e.t.c., and posted here about that fact. Pretty sure it’s a BM bug.

Read full topic

item.title: Enemies 'disappearing' in bm_c2a2b [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: felcon
item.description:
even though I don’t have the utmost best PC, it’s not a hardware issue, i guarantee you that.
And by running that demo I linked with my post, you can see the bug live too. So if it was indeed a hardware issue you wouldn’t see it on the demo.

Read full topic

item.title: Enemies 'disappearing' in bm_c2a2b [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: lexa2
item.description:
Confirming. Seems to be BM bug rather than hw/sw specific issue.

Position:

] getpos
setpos 2161.593994 99.052658 200.031250;setang 4.495236 -96.684280 -0.142822

Read full topic

item.title: Enemies 'disappearing' in bm_c2a2b [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: lexa2
item.description:
Could you please provide info on your hardware and software specs as detailed in bug reporting guidelines? CPU/GPU/RAM/VRAM/OS, e.t.c.

Had you changed anything in BMS cfg files from the default values? Had you changed any cvars on console while playing for some reasons?

Read full topic

item.title: Enemies 'disappearing' in bm_c2a2b [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: felcon
item.description:
Yeah, to me it seemed like you need to come from a specific direction to ‘activate’ enemies, otherwise they won’t start engaging.

Read full topic

item.title: Enemies 'disappearing' in bm_c2a2b [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: Verdale
item.description:
I’m not sure if this is related, but I’ve also noticed disappearing enemies throughout BMS. Notably, if you rush the first houndeye you see and attack it before it finishes its scripted animation, the houndeye will become invisible and resume its normal attack scripts. I’ve also had problems with repelling Marines becoming invisible as well. At first I thought I was just blind, but after a few reloads, I was able to see one that I could not before.

I will try to recreate this issue when I have time and post screenshots/videos.

Read full topic
